title: Number of TV ads seen daily per person in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2008 to 2015
summary: Overall Advertisements seen has increased over the Year.
Advertisements seen is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2012.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Advertisements seen, of value 47.0 was reached at Year 2011, and 2012
The lowest Advertisements seen, of value 43.0 was reported at Year 2009
min_summary: In general Advertisements seen has rose over the Year.
Advertisements seen is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2012.
